data.title: Ja Morant names Mike Miller as his new agent
data.meta_description: Ja Morant reportedly hires former Memphis Grizzlies player and Tigers assistant coach Mike Miller as his new agent.Related story:Mike Miller sees new client Ja Morant as top five in the NBA
data.meta_site_name: Memphis Local, Sports, Business & Food News | Daily Memphian
data.text:
David Boyd

David Boyd has over 30 years of experience working in Memphis journalism. A familiar face to the Memphis sports community, his extensive background ranges from high school sports to working on the game-day stats crews for both the Memphis Grizzlies and Memphis Tigers.
